thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really perfect
thread.title_full: Really perfect - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: fwoedit
title: Really perfect
text: I came for Paris Fashion Week and I have to say this is the true definition of the word "gem." This place was designed with an artist's eye, the breakfast is delicious (and comparable or cheaper than many New York hotel breakfasts), and the staff is second to none. I don't use the word "perfect" lightly -- it's that amazing. I want to stay places that are beautiful, convenient, and that leave me with a good feeling. This place was a 10 in all categories. They held my invitations for me, and even helped me get an early check in (with a bit of good luck). I can't imagine staying anywhere else. Oh, and great coffee, too!
